forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. North wind 5 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening deepens in Downtown San Francisco, the sky above is mostly clear, granting a view of a tranquil night, punctuated only by the soft murmur of the North wind gently sweeping through at 5 to 14 mph. The temperature dips to a refreshing 47 degrees, inviting a cozy layering of clothes—perhaps a light jacket over a warm sweater—perfect for braving the evening chill while strolling through the quiet streets or sipping a warm drink at a nearby café.

Come Saturday, the sun is expected to grace the city, coaxing the temperatures up to a pleasant 62 degrees before retracing to 58 in the afternoon, under a bright and cheerful sky. The North wind will pick up a little, carrying whispers of higher gusts, adding a brisk edge to the day. With clear visibility promising stunning views, it is an ideal day for a leisurely walk or a leisurely brunch at an outdoor café, where one can bask in the warmth of the sun while enjoying heartwarming conversations. The peaceful clarity of the day encourages exploration; perhaps a visit to a local gallery or a meander through the historic streets of the neighborhood would be in order, ensuring the heart of the city is enjoyed to the fullest.
